articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: Early ‘Shogun’ Reviews Score It Higher Than ‘Game Of Thrones’ - Forbes
articles.description: Shogun has incredible scores from both critics and fans, right now ranking it among some of the best series in TV history.
articles.content:
Shogun
FX
While samurai drama Shogun has sat with a perfect 100% among critics for a couple weeks now, the show has only just debuted on FX/Hulu as of Tuesday. Now, fans are realizing that this is … [+2323 chars]

articles.title: Should We Worry About Prince William Canceling Event? Royal Experts Say Yes - Cosmopolitan
articles.description: Royal experts say that Prince William pulling out of his godfather's memorial service is "worrying" and "concerning."
articles.content:
Prince William pulled out of a memorial service for his godfather at the last minute yesterday (February 27), prompting growing concern and speculation.
